document_data.caption: A map of showing the Great Amber Steppes within the vast expanse of the Hordelands.
document_data.name: Great Amber Steppes
document_data.mainbody: The '''Great Amber Steppes''' was a vast stretch of land found in the [[Hordelands]].{{Cite dragon/349/The Horde: Barbarians of the Endless Waste}}
document_data.Geography: The plains of the Great Amber Steppes were surrounded to the south by the [[Mountains of Copper]] and the [[Khopet-Dag]], to the north by the [[Lake of Mists]] and the [[Golden Way]], to the east by the [[Firepeaks]] and [[Sentinelspire (mountain)|Sentinelspire]], and to the west by the [[Sunrise Mountains]].
